    FROM [UserGroups] AS [u0]
    WHERE [u0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [u1] ON [u].[id] = [u1].[UserId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g].[id]
    FROM [Groups] AS [g]
    WHERE [g].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g0] ON [u1].[GroupId] = [g0].[id]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g1].[GroupID], [g1].[MenuID], [g1].[Access], [g1].[CanDelete], [g1].[CanInsert], [g1].[CanUpdate]

) AS [m0] ON [g2].[MenuID] = [m0].[id]

    WHERE [u0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [u1] ON [u].[id] = [u1].[UserId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g].[id]
    FROM [Groups] AS [g]
    WHERE [g].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g0] ON [u1].[GroupId] = [g0].[id]

    SELECT [g1].[GroupID], [g1].[MenuID], [g1].[Access], [g1].[CanDelete], [g1].[CanInsert], [g1].[CanUpdate]

) AS [m0] ON [g2].[MenuID] = [m0].[id]

    SELECT [u0].[UserId], [u0].[GroupId]
    FROM [UserGroups] AS [u0]
    WHERE [u0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [u1] ON [u].[id] = [u1].[UserId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g].[id]
    FROM [Groups] AS [g]
    WHERE [g].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g0] ON [u1].[GroupId] = [g0].[id]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g1].[GroupID], [g1].[MenuID], [g1].[Access], [g1].[CanDelete], [g1].[CanInsert], [g1].[CanUpdate]
    FROM [GroupsMenus] AS [g1]
    WHERE [g1].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

    FROM [Menus] AS [m]
    WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [m0] ON [g2].[MenuID] = [m0].[id]

SELECT DISTINCT [g2].[Access], [g2].[CanDelete], [g2].[CanInsert], [g2].[CanUpdate], [m0].[IconClass], [g2].[MenuID] AS [MenuId], [m0].[Name], [m0].[Path], [m0].[ParentID] AS [MenuParentId], [u].[Username]
FROM [Users] AS [u]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [u0].[UserId], [u0].[GroupId]
    FROM [UserGroups] AS [u0]
    WHERE [u0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [u1] ON [u].[id] = [u1].[UserId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g].[id]
    FROM [Groups] AS [g]
    WHERE [g].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g0] ON [u1].[GroupId] = [g0].[id]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g1].[GroupID], [g1].[MenuID], [g1].[Access], [g1].[CanDelete], [g1].[CanInsert], [g1].[CanUpdate]
    FROM [GroupsMenus] AS [g1]
    WHERE [g1].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g2] ON [g0].[id] = [g2].[GroupID]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [m].[id], [m].[IconClass], [m].[Name], [m].[ParentID], [m].[Path]
    FROM [Menus] AS [m]
    WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [m0] ON [g2].[MenuID] = [m0].[id]
WHERE [u].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[Path] IS NOT NULL AND [m0].[Path] NOT LIKE N'' AND LOWER([m0].[Path]) = @__ToLower_0

    WHERE [u0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)

SELECT @var = [d].[name]
FROM [sys].[default_constraints] [d]
INNER JOIN [sys].[columns] [c] ON [d].[parent_column_id] = [c].[column_id] AND [d].[parent_object_id] = [c].[object_id]
WHERE ([d].[parent_object_id] = OBJECT_ID(N'[PersonsPhones]') AND [c].[name] = N'PhoneType');

    SELECT [u0].[UserId], [u0].[GroupId]
    FROM [UserGroups] AS [u0]
    WHERE [u0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [u1] ON [u].[id] = [u1].[UserId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g].[id]
    FROM [Groups] AS [g]
    WHERE [g].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g0] ON [u1].[GroupId] = [g0].[id]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g1].[GroupID], [g1].[MenuID], [g1].[Access], [g1].[CanDelete], [g1].[CanInsert], [g1].[CanUpdate]
    FROM [GroupsMenus] AS [g1]

) AS [m0] ON [g2].[MenuID] = [m0].[id]

    FROM [Groups] AS [g]
    WHERE [g].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g0] ON [u1].[GroupId] = [g0].[id]

    SELECT [g1].[GroupID], [g1].[MenuID], [g1].[Access], [g1].[CanDelete], [g1].[CanInsert], [g1].[CanUpdate]
    FROM [GroupsMenus] AS [g1]
    WHERE [g1].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g2] ON [g0].[id] = [g2].[GroupID]

    FROM [Menus] AS [m]
    WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [m0] ON [g2].[MenuID] = [m0].[id]

SELECT DISTINCT [g2].[Access], [g2].[CanDelete], [g2].[CanInsert], [g2].[CanUpdate], [m0].[IconClass], [g2].[MenuID] AS [MenuId], [m0].[Name], [m0].[Path], [m0].[ParentID] AS [MenuParentId], [u].[Username]
FROM [Users] AS [u]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [u0].[UserId], [u0].[GroupId]
    FROM [UserGroups] AS [u0]
    WHERE [u0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [u1] ON [u].[id] = [u1].[UserId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g].[id]
    FROM [Groups] AS [g]
    WHERE [g].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g0] ON [u1].[GroupId] = [g0].[id]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g1].[GroupID], [g1].[MenuID], [g1].[Access], [g1].[CanDelete], [g1].[CanInsert], [g1].[CanUpdate]
    FROM [GroupsMenus] AS [g1]
    WHERE [g1].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g2] ON [g0].[id] = [g2].[GroupID]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [m].[id], [m].[IconClass], [m].[Name], [m].[ParentID], [m].[Path]
    FROM [Menus] AS [m]
    WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [m0] ON [g2].[MenuID] = [m0].[id]
WHERE [u].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[Path] IS NOT NULL AND [m0].[Path] NOT LIKE N'' AND LOWER([m0].[Path]) = @__ToLower_0

SELECT DISTINCT [g2].[Access], [g2].[CanDelete], [g2].[CanInsert], [g2].[CanUpdate], [m0].[IconClass], [g2].[MenuID] AS [MenuId], [m0].[Name], [m0].[Path], [m0].[ParentID] AS [MenuParentId], [u].[Username]
FROM [Users] AS [u]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [u0].[UserId], [u0].[GroupId]
    FROM [UserGroups] AS [u0]
    WHERE [u0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [u1] ON [u].[id] = [u1].[UserId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g].[id]
    FROM [Groups] AS [g]
    WHERE [g].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g0] ON [u1].[GroupId] = [g0].[id]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g1].[GroupID], [g1].[MenuID], [g1].[Access], [g1].[CanDelete], [g1].[CanInsert], [g1].[CanUpdate]
    FROM [GroupsMenus] AS [g1]
    WHERE [g1].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g2] ON [g0].[id] = [g2].[GroupID]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [m].[id], [m].[IconClass], [m].[Name], [m].[ParentID], [m].[Path]
    FROM [Menus] AS [m]
    WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [m0] ON [g2].[MenuID] = [m0].[id]

SELECT DISTINCT [g2].[Access], [g2].[CanDelete], [g2].[CanInsert], [g2].[CanUpdate], [m0].[IconClass], [g2].[MenuID] AS [MenuId], [m0].[Name], [m0].[Path], [m0].[ParentID] AS [MenuParentId], [u].[Username]
FROM [Users] AS [u]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [u0].[UserId], [u0].[GroupId]
    FROM [UserGroups] AS [u0]
    WHERE [u0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [u1] ON [u].[id] = [u1].[UserId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g].[id]
    FROM [Groups] AS [g]
    WHERE [g].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g0] ON [u1].[GroupId] = [g0].[id]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g1].[GroupID], [g1].[MenuID], [g1].[Access], [g1].[CanDelete], [g1].[CanInsert], [g1].[CanUpdate]
    FROM [GroupsMenus] AS [g1]
    WHERE [g1].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g2] ON [g0].[id] = [g2].[GroupID]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [m].[id], [m].[IconClass], [m].[Name], [m].[ParentID], [m].[Path]
    FROM [Menus] AS [m]
    WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [m0] ON [g2].[MenuID] = [m0].[id]
WHERE [u].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[Path] IS NOT NULL AND [m0].[Path] NOT LIKE N'' AND LOWER([m0].[Path]) = @__ToLower_0

SELECT DISTINCT [g2].[Access], [g2].[CanDelete], [g2].[CanInsert], [g2].[CanUpdate], [m0].[IconClass], [g2].[MenuID] AS [MenuId], [m0].[Name], [m0].[Path], [m0].[ParentID] AS [MenuParentId], [u].[Username]
FROM [Users] AS [u]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [u0].[UserId], [u0].[GroupId]
    FROM [UserGroups] AS [u0]
    WHERE [u0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [u1] ON [u].[id] = [u1].[UserId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g].[id]
    FROM [Groups] AS [g]
    WHERE [g].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g0] ON [u1].[GroupId] = [g0].[id]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g1].[GroupID], [g1].[MenuID], [g1].[Access], [g1].[CanDelete], [g1].[CanInsert], [g1].[CanUpdate]
    FROM [GroupsMenus] AS [g1]
    WHERE [g1].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g2] ON [g0].[id] = [g2].[GroupID]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [m].[id], [m].[IconClass], [m].[Name], [m].[ParentID], [m].[Path]
    FROM [Menus] AS [m]
    WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [m0] ON [g2].[MenuID] = [m0].[id]
WHERE [u].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[Path] IS NOT NULL AND [m0].[Path] NOT LIKE N'' AND LOWER([m0].[Path]) = @__ToLower_0

If the 'Distinct' operator is used after 'OrderBy', then make sure to use the 'OrderBy' operator after 'Distinct' as the ordering would otherwise get erased.

If the 'Distinct' operator is used after 'OrderBy', then make sure to use the 'OrderBy' operator after 'Distinct' as the ordering would otherwise get erased.

FROM [Users] AS [u]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [u0].[UserId], [u0].[GroupId]
    FROM [UserGroups] AS [u0]
    WHERE [u0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [u1] ON [u].[id] = [u1].[UserId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g].[id]
    FROM [Groups] AS [g]
    WHERE [g].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g0] ON [u1].[GroupId] = [g0].[id]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g1].[GroupID], [g1].[MenuID], [g1].[Access], [g1].[CanDelete], [g1].[CanInsert], [g1].[CanUpdate]
    FROM [GroupsMenus] AS [g1]
    WHERE [g1].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g2] ON [g0].[id] = [g2].[GroupID]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [m].[id], [m].[IconClass], [m].[Name], [m].[ParentID], [m].[Path]
    FROM [Menus] AS [m]
    WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [m0] ON [g2].[MenuID] = [m0].[id]
WHERE [u].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[Path] IS NOT NULL AND [m0].[Path] NOT LIKE N'' AND LOWER([m0].[Path]) = @__ToLower_0

SELECT DISTINCT [g2].[Access], [g2].[CanDelete], [g2].[CanInsert], [g2].[CanUpdate], [m0].[IconClass], [g2].[MenuID] AS [MenuId], [m0].[Name], [m0].[Path], [m0].[ParentID] AS [MenuParentId], [u].[Username]
FROM [Users] AS [u]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [u0].[UserId], [u0].[GroupId]
    FROM [UserGroups] AS [u0]
    WHERE [u0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [u1] ON [u].[id] = [u1].[UserId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g].[id]
    FROM [Groups] AS [g]
    WHERE [g].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g0] ON [u1].[GroupId] = [g0].[id]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g1].[GroupID], [g1].[MenuID], [g1].[Access], [g1].[CanDelete], [g1].[CanInsert], [g1].[CanUpdate]
    FROM [GroupsMenus] AS [g1]
    WHERE [g1].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g2] ON [g0].[id] = [g2].[GroupID]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [m].[id], [m].[IconClass], [m].[Name], [m].[ParentID], [m].[Path]
    FROM [Menus] AS [m]
    WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [m0] ON [g2].[MenuID] = [m0].[id]
WHERE [u].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[Path] IS NOT NULL AND [m0].[Path] NOT LIKE N'' AND LOWER([m0].[Path]) = @__ToLower_0

SELECT DISTINCT [g2].[Access], [g2].[CanDelete], [g2].[CanInsert], [g2].[CanUpdate], [m0].[IconClass], [g2].[MenuID] AS [MenuId], [m0].[Name], [m0].[Path], [m0].[ParentID] AS [MenuParentId], [u].[Username]
FROM [Users] AS [u]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [u0].[UserId], [u0].[GroupId]
    FROM [UserGroups] AS [u0]
    WHERE [u0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [u1] ON [u].[id] = [u1].[UserId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g].[id]
    FROM [Groups] AS [g]
    WHERE [g].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g0] ON [u1].[GroupId] = [g0].[id]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g1].[GroupID], [g1].[MenuID], [g1].[Access], [g1].[CanDelete], [g1].[CanInsert], [g1].[CanUpdate]
    FROM [GroupsMenus] AS [g1]
    WHERE [g1].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g2] ON [g0].[id] = [g2].[GroupID]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [m].[id], [m].[IconClass], [m].[Name], [m].[ParentID], [m].[Path]
    FROM [Menus] AS [m]
    WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [m0] ON [g2].[MenuID] = [m0].[id]
WHERE [u].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[Path] IS NOT NULL AND [m0].[Path] NOT LIKE N'' AND LOWER([m0].[Path]) = @__ToLower_0

FROM [Users] AS [u]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [u0].[UserId], [u0].[GroupId]
    FROM [UserGroups] AS [u0]
    WHERE [u0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [u1] ON [u].[id] = [u1].[UserId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g].[id]
    FROM [Groups] AS [g]
    WHERE [g].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g0] ON [u1].[GroupId] = [g0].[id]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g1].[GroupID], [g1].[MenuID], [g1].[Access], [g1].[CanDelete], [g1].[CanInsert], [g1].[CanUpdate]
    FROM [GroupsMenus] AS [g1]
    WHERE [g1].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g2] ON [g0].[id] = [g2].[GroupID]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [m].[id], [m].[IconClass], [m].[Name], [m].[ParentID], [m].[Path]
    FROM [Menus] AS [m]
    WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [m0] ON [g2].[MenuID] = [m0].[id]
WHERE [u].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit) AND [m0].[Path] IS NOT NULL AND [m0].[Path] NOT LIKE N'' AND LOWER([m0].[Path]) = @__ToLower_0

    FROM [Groups] AS [g]
    WHERE [g].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g0] ON [u1].[GroupId] = [g0].[id]

) AS [g2] ON [g0].[id] = [g2].[GroupID]

FROM [Users] AS [u]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [u0].[UserId], [u0].[GroupId]
    FROM [UserGroups] AS [u0]
    WHERE [u0].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [u1] ON [u].[id] = [u1].[UserId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g].[id]
    FROM [Groups] AS [g]
    WHERE [g].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g0] ON [u1].[GroupId] = [g0].[id]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [g1].[GroupID], [g1].[MenuID], [g1].[Access], [g1].[CanDelete], [g1].[CanInsert], [g1].[CanUpdate]
    FROM [GroupsMenus] AS [g1]
    WHERE [g1].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g2] ON [g0].[id] = [g2].[GroupID]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [m].[id], [m].[IconClass], [m].[Name], [m].[ParentID], [m].[Path]
    FROM [Menus] AS [m]
    WHERE [m].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [m0] ON [g2].[MenuID] = [m0].[id]

    WHERE [g1].[IsDeleted] = CAST(0 AS bit)
) AS [g2] ON [g0].[id] = [g2].[GroupID]

) AS [m0] ON [g2].[MenuID] = [m0].[id]
